body.name: Accordion File Organizer with Handle,25 Pockets Portable Expanding File Folders A4/Letter Size,Accordian File Organizers,Durable Expandable Filing folders,a-z Tabs,Perfect for Office,Home
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 51 mins
features: 【INNOVATIVE】 Expanding file folder with Handle is innovative upgrade file organizer, designed with snap and adjustable strap plus durable handle, one second to lock it, easy to open and close, creating more orginizing possibilities and safely carry to everywhere.

【COMPETITIVE】Sytlish 3D diamond pattern for the cover of Accordian file orgainzer,Looks very fashionable and luxurious. Folder with 25 individual colorful pockets including colored insert tabs, clear classification and mark, built your own personalized storage solution, It's absoutely perfect gift for your kids,lover and Parants.

【SAFETY&DURABLE MATERIALS】Accordion file folder are made by high quality polypropylene and polyester, self-standing, durable, not easy to be broken and deformed. 100% Waterproof, Non toxic, Non Odor, Anti-wear, tear and Moisture resistant.

【EXPANDING & LARGE CAPACITY】Expandable 25 colored pockets organizer is suitable for A4 paper and letter size, very good solution for your files cabinet. Folding size is 13x9.5X3inch, It can be expanded from 3 inches to 27 inches. Each pocket of document organizer can be expanded to 1.3inches. Accommodate approximately over 3000 sheets.

【MULTIPLE USAGE】 Filing box file classwork, homework for students; file important documents, bill, receipt, paper for businessman; file cooking menu, warranties, manuals for parents. Super easy to carry all your necessary documents to home, school, library, meeting room.
【NO RISK SHOPPING】24 hours on line to service customer, timely answer all consumer’s question. Accept return without any reason and 100% refund for unsatisfied product.

CLASSIC * STYLISH * CONVENIENT WHEREVER YOU GO,WHATEVER YOU DO, YOU CAN TAKE YOUR NECESSARIES WITH THIS FILE FOLDERS When students go to school or the library, they need to organize their classwork and carry it; When businessmen go out for meetings or business trips, they need to keep all their important documents safe and carry it; This expanding file orgainzer is perfect choice for them, designed with 25 individual pockets, including tab and inserts, colored label, lock catch is very special for making sure documents are kept safely.

FILE FOLDER ORGANIZER WITH HANDLE ---Create more and more organizing possibilities. Office important documents managing such as contract/ agreements/invoice/ bills/ receipt/meeting notes/notice/personal files...etc; Kids memories file managing such as special school projects/report cards/pictures/letters/medical information/ handed paintings...etc.; Lover’s memories managing such as special letters/special cards/special time record/small gifts/secret agreements...etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable file case for individual !
reviews.reviewText: This is replacing a hard file case as I have downsized ? One thing that could be included would be stickers to label each folder. I do like its folding ability. It doesn’t take up the room. Good for a smaller supply of papers .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expands and case is sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: I like that it has so many expandable folders. I store my craft making stickers in it. It is portable and sturdy enough to carry from one location to another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for household warranties and Instruction Books
reviews.reviewText: This organizer is perfect for holding all the manuals, warranties and paperwork that comes with new gadgets and appliances. I staple receipts for items to the cover and insert alphabetically into organizer. I know I can get information online, but sometimes this is quicker. Good price, sturdy and just the right size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and well made
reviews.reviewText: This was a great selection and I may buy a few more. Price was fair, too. Great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pockets not deep enough
reviews.reviewText: I get a new folder every year. We are 8 months in and the tabs are no longer visible. The tabs need to be at least 1/2 inch higher to be visible. 3/4 inch deeper pocket would be better because you need to push against the edge of the paper sticking out to find the tab and the paper edges are getting bent on some documents. The other knock is it would never stand up. You would need two hands to use it. I solved the problem by keeping it in a desk drawer and screwing the from to the side of the drawer to the folders stays upright and useable. I side from that it is staying in one piece and there are plenty of pockets. It will easilly expand to a foot, so document capacity is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It came in time and fit all the items. I have no issues, it is sturdy and the clips are strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product for a great price!!
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that I can fit a lot of files in a sleek, portable case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product missing tab inserts. Looks good otherwise.
